title: Tim Madison, Galactic Warrior
description: Night after night, thirteen-year-old Tim Madison is haunted by visions of aliens and destruction. His simple life is turned upside down when he discovers the horrifying truth. The dreams are true, and part of his Galactic Warrior training. Now he's in a race against time as something deadly grows inside Earth-but it may be too late.
author: Neil D. Ostroff
